Package org.example.crmedu.domain.service.user

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.example.crmedu.domain.service.BaseService<User>
org.example.crmedu.domain.service.user.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseCrudService<User>, UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends BaseService<User> implements UserService
Implementation of the UserService interface. Provides business logic for managing User entities.
